com.bitwise.decaf.editor.grammar
Class CodeNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.hs.generator.GConstruct
        |
        +--com.bitwise.decaf.editor.grammar.CodeNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.hs.util.Copy, Decaf, at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ReferenceListener, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ScopeReference, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Grammar, Paragraph
public abstract class CodeNode
extends GConstruct
implements com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ScopeReference, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ReferenceListener, Decaf

CodeNode is the abstract base class for all nodes in the code tree under the DMethod.BodyGrammar. It maintains a reference to its parent, and keeps a list of listeners to its content changes. All events fired by CodeNode and its subclasses are subsequently fired on the parent, and in this way recursively passed up the tree. CodeNode fires events when:

1) it receives a ReferenceEvent
2) it receives a call to the GConstruct reflection
accessor set(Field, Object) 3) it receives a call to notifyNewData()

Use editPathToCup() to open editors from the enclosing method body to this CodeNode; use describePathToCup() to obtain a component displaying a String representation of this path.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

focusedBorder

public static Border focusedBorder
When the component that displays the complete content of this CodeNode is in focus, this border is applied to components that display a reference to this CodeNode.

See Also:
Grammar.render()

selectedBorder

public static Border selectedBorder
This border is applied to the single active selection item in a list of CodeNode`s. Multiple selections may be highlighted with a background color (or any other way you like), but the single most recent selection must be identified and marked with this border.

notifyNewData

public void notifyNewData()
Notify this CodeNode that its data has changed. A CodeNode.Event of type DATA_CHANGED will be fired to the listeners.
